linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Hardware Accelerator Card Required - OpenGL 3.0 compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Mac, OS X version 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Hardware Accelerator Card Required - OpenGL 3.0 compatible
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Intel Mac, OS X version 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP1 and higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor
  • Graphics: 3D Hardware Accelerator Card Required – 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible 128 MB Video Memory. ATI® Radeon® 9600 or Nvidia® GeForce® 5900

short_description: In the new campaign, you'll be able to see the war from the perspective of an ordinary officer. You will have to fight alongside Turkish and Austrian troops against the Serbian and Italian armies.
